2803.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_IN_APPLICATION
2803.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2803.short_description: Your account is permanently banned from this application
2803.long_description: Your account is permanently banned from this application
2803.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
2803.long_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
